H.content: “at this very moment”: antinomy of laws in the plural and absolutely singular law
there are 2 plurals, different at same time: 1) multiplicity, plural laws 2) One + a multiplicity, One + n [plus d’un]
One + n, the antinomic addition, adds conditional laws to unconditional law of hospitality

SPOM.content: “we” will not please Marxists, insisting on the spirt of Marxism as spirits in the plural and in the sense of specter, allowing untimely specters to come back

HERP.content: “voice of the friend” > a kind of oneness that does not exclude plurality
acc. Heidegger, dual hands, dual ears [ontic?], single hands, single ears [ontological: hear, give?] > passage from plural to singular is essential

MPM.content: Mémoires: changes from singular to plural, ungenders
the 2 masculine values (singular or plural) of mémoire always suppose spatial inscription whereas la mémoire, even pluralized, does not

EM.content: Nietzsche: if there is style it must be plural [perhaps we need a change of “style”]

PAS.content: dissemination does not play w/ the multiple, plural, dispersion, the apart (épars), but with the unique, the unique and itself

FSW.content: we must be several in order to write, even to “perceive”

T.content: margin, march, demarcation pass btwn denegation (plurality of modes) and deconstruction (systematic unity of a spiral)

WM.content: because metaphoric is plural from the start, it cannot escape syntax, it organizes its division w/in syntax, cannot be what it is except in erasing itself, indefinitely constructing its destruction

ROP.content: to pluralize offers an emergency exit (se donner une issue de secours), until the plural kills you [re: title “Resistances”]

SP.content: plus d’un spur, never been the woman > if there’s going to be style, pour que le simulacrum advienne, il faut écrire dans l’écart entre plusieurs styles: anchor lost in abyss btwn—telle est l’échéance

OTO.content: Dionysus vs. Crucified, name of versus, countername, suffices to pluralize (in a singular fashion) homonymic mask & proper name, to lead all threads of name astray in labyrinth (ear)

ATIA.content: transgressal experience of limitrophy, trephō, trophē, trophos: to feed limit, train, nurse, make grow, thicken, fold, divide the line, multiply/increase limit’s figures [not efface the limit]
the animort? pluralizing animal, renouncing unification of concept, so it can’t be opposed to anything identifiable (man, the dead)

O.content: dissemination: doesn’t simply place plural in effervescence > il s’agite de la contradiction sans fin, marked by undecidable syntax of plus

TB.content: Babel, exemplary: myth of myth, translation of translation > tells need for figures, tropes, for translation inadequate to compensate for what multiplicity denies us

multiplicity of idioms limits “true” translation & is a structural order, a coherence of construct: internal limit to formalization, incompleteness of constructure > up to a certain point justified to see there translation of a system in deconstruction

CHM.content: Cogitos (Descartes’ is neither first nor last Cogito)

Gi.content: Streuung (a dissemination, a multiplication, not a multiplicity), Zerstreuung the intensive determination of the former—how can it not be contaminated by negating fall in zer-?
Dasein> always interacts w/ multiple objects, not because there are many but because of Dasein’s originary disseminal structure, its dispersion (Zerstreuung)

Gii.content: hands in plural already/still either organic or technical dispersion
Heidegger avoids reference to mirror of hands found in Kant [since Dasein> only has a single hand], play of right & left > this difference can only be sensible
Heidegger always privileges gathering: only mentions hands (in the plural) to bring them together in prayer

PIO.content: “the call of the other is a call to come, and that happens only in multiple voices”

RM.content: re-trait of metaphor > gives rise to an abyssal generalization of metaphor > trait has internal multiplicity, la structure pliée-repliée d’un re-trait > opens out the borders or invaginates them
retrait is plural, singularly plural [Nancy] in itself, divides itself, gathers up in withdrawal of withdrawal > elsewhere, Derrida called this pas

WAP.content: necessary to think of “Philosophies of Right,” given Hegel’s constant reformulating

EJQB.content: Nietzsche: the poet “hides deserts w/in him”

PJP.content: more than 1 voice in 1 voice, dispersion, threatens concept of perjury, threatens identity, threatens concept “I”; Schlegel’s “permanent parabasis of irony”
the 3 meanings of title Le Parjure—internal interruption, intrinsic multiplicity

D.content: “primitive” mythical unity always reconstituted retrospectively dans l’après-coupure > the decision,> le coup (shot, throw, blow) parts the seed as it projects it (partage la semence en la projetant)
numerical multiplicity not death threat sneaking up on unified germ, it pathbreaks (fraye la voie) for “the” seed (semence), which advances/produces (itself) in plural: singular plural
mathematicogenetic theory of groups: [if this were intended to mean anything] nothing prior to group (no originary unity prior to division)

text occupies place before “me,” announces me to myself—une tour de guet (watchtower) planted inside me > like a “transparent column,” pure outside: driven into that which tries to close in on itself > imagine you swallowed a cylindrical mirror, tower of Babel, bottomless plurality, not negative…also phallic [p. 342 in Zohar: “great, ungraspable columns of air”]
polysemy multiplies w/in horizon of final parousia, temporary detours of lived passion, a signifying martyrdom of truth past or truth to come [thus, dissemination not polysemy]
polysemy forgets its horizon is framed: difference btwn discursive polysemy and textual dissemination is difference itself

+R.content: [Derrida on 2 hands] > to write one must be several

C.content: I am myself cartouche and cartouches(s) in the plural: “I” sign myself to death as soon as there’s the title, reduce myself to first heading, capital, shrunken head

LI.content: [re: neologism texter] signature, événement qu’on texte: process of iteration, like surnombre [of Dissemination], marks pluralization that fractures the event, the unique, while causing it to occur (arriver)
differance removes from itself what was written “in its name,” removes the proper name: changes itself into more or less anonymous multiplicity

TN.content: for Nancy, touching is very experience of “origin” as “plural singularity” > being w/ (cum or co-), community as co-tact > se toucher soi-même, se toucher l’un l’autre ou les uns les autres
French grammar’s tolerance of reflexiveness in plural & singular: subject of book
for Chrétian, Christ is one, common body, not a plurality of bodies > Chrétian & Nancy deal w/ a different “yes,” or a different provenance of same “yes,” addressed to “you”
that which can’t be sublated, the dissemination of essence (of the One) > dissemination pluralizes any singularity that allows one to say “the” touch, “the” body
Nancy’s “there is no ‘the’…” could deprive him of any conceptual determination, or hand over the discourse to irresponsible empiricism > Socrates has been teaching us this for years

AD.content: unicity (absolute, irrecusable singularity) of face is plural a priori via substitution

CIN.content: plurality of cinders, innumerable lurks (couvait) beneath the cinder

CIR.content: I perjure like I breathe, whose multitude runs in the tears
